
def binary(n):
	if(n==0):
		return [0]
	else:		
		list=[]
		while(n>0):
			list.append(n%2)
			n/=2
		return list
	
def nthNumber(n):
	list=binary(n)
	sum=0
	pow=5
	for elem in list: 
		sum+=elem*pow
		pow*=5

	return sum

cases=int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(cases):
	num=int(raw_input())
	print nthNumber(num)
